scripts.build: tsup src/index.tsx && cp -r src/assets ./dist && chmod +x dist/index.js
scripts.auth:help: npm run build && dist/index.js auth help
scripts.auth:login: npm run build && dist/index.js auth login
scripts.auth:print-access-token: npm run build && dist/index.js auth print-access-token
scripts.auth:logout: npm run build && dist/index.js auth logout
